result.rationale: This species is only known from the type locality in the Saramacca river. It has a restricted distribution with an extent of occurrence (EOO) of 2,287 km<sup>2</sup> and an area of occupancy (AOO) of 1,876 km<sup>2</sup>. No direct threats are known for this species, although mining and related deforestation are evident from satellite images in the area. There is one location based on this threat. Therefore, this species is assessed as NT B1a+2a pending the results of further surveys in the type locality in order to verify whether it is experiencing impacts from mining.
result.geographicrange: This species is only known from the type locality in the Saramacca river (Boeseman 1968, Weber et al. 2012).
result.population: No population assessments are known for this species.
result.habitat: No specific habitat information is known for this species.
result.threats: Mining is evident from photographs upstream and downstream of the type locality. However, this species is not directly in the main channel of the Saramacca river, and occurs in its drainage area instead.
result.conservationmeasures: No specific conservation actions are known for this species.
result.usetrade: No uses are known for this species.
